answers.answer: Hello,The feeling of burning sensation of legs may be found in  diabetes,peripheral artery disease,peripheral neuropathy,claudication,peripheral nerve trauma or compression,cerebrovascular accident(TIA and stroke),malnutrition,perimenopause in females,abnormal levels of calcium, potassium, or sodium in your body and a lack of vitamin B12, multiple sclerosis and underactive thyroid.You can take multivitamins for some time. Also get your blood sugar tested.My opinion is to get yourself examined by a neurologist. After confirmatory diagnosis only, treatment can be started.Pls keep us posted if you need any more information. Regards and Take care.

title: Intense Heat inside my both legs
